name: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning - Teeth of Naros
name_original: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning - Teeth of Naros
description:
Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning - Teeth of Naros is a RPG game developed by Big Huge Games and 38 Studios. It came out on 18-04-2012. Electronic Arts published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning - Teeth of Naros on PC and PlayStation 3.
